definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

pinyin: kai1 fang4 xi4 tong3 hu4 lian2

sentences.english: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bzier curves to the current figure.
sentences.chinese: 在当前图形中添加一系列相互连接的立方贝塞尔曲线。

sentences.english: In this paper, the background of parasitic capacitance extraction of interconnects are briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 对互连寄生电容提取的研究背景进行了简要的介绍。

sentences.english: A novel micro-optical crossover interconnection package has been proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种新颖的自由空间微光学互连模块。

sentences.english: Secondly, the complexity of fully-connected kernel auto-associative memory models is reduced.
sentences.chinese: 对全互连的核自联想记忆模型框架进行了稀疏化改造。

sentences.english: All the computers in our school will be connected to the Internet this year.
sentences.chinese: 学校所有的计算机今年将与互连网相连。

sentences.english: A two-layer parallel optical interconnection network with expansibility was designed.
sentences.chinese: 本文设计一种具有可扩展性的双层并行光互连网络。

sentences.english: Internet is very popularly used both in campus and city itself.
sentences.chinese: 互连网已在校园内外广泛使用。

sentences.english: A two-layer parallel optical interconnection network with rotary joint function was designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计一个具有旋转连接功能的双层并行光互连网络。

sentences.english: A two-layer parallel optical interconnection network with expansibility is designed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文设计一种具有可扩展性的双层并行光互连网络。

sentences.english: BLAST searching showed they are novel genes.
sentences.chinese: 国际互连网BLAST查询表明该基因为新基因。

sentences.english: Routing is an important concept in the computer internetwork science.
sentences.chinese: 路由是计算机网络互连的重要概念。

sentences.english: Modeling and designing the mediation flows required to support the required interconnectivity.
sentences.chinese: 对支持所需互连所必需的中介流进行建模和设计。

sentences.english: This makes it impossible for large companies and governments to control the interconnect.
sentences.chinese: 这让大公司和政府不可能控制相互连接。

sentences.english: The development of submicron designs has worsened the problem of interconnect crosstalk.
sentences.chinese: 随着深亚微米设计的发展，互连线串扰变得更加严重。

sentences.english: Two domains interconnected by means of equipment located at adjacent nodes.
sentences.chinese: 借助于相邻网点处的设备互连起来的两个域。

sentences.english: To make a model . The aspects of an application process pertinent to OSI.
sentences.chinese: 应用进程与开放系统互连模型相关的各个方面。

definition: variant of 連接|连接[lian2 jie1]
network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
